bio.tool description: Deep representation learning for disease prediction based on microbiome data.DeepMicro is a deep representation learning framework exploiting various autoencoders to learn robust low-dimensional representations from high-dimensional data and training classification models based on the learned representation.

Description: Machine Learning tool suite from Scikit-learn
Deep Learning method for novel virus detection in sequencing data
bio.tool description: VirHunter is a deep learning method that uses Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) and a Random Forest Classifier to identify viruses in sequencing datasets. More precisely, VirHunter classifies previously assembled contigs as viral, host, and bacterial (contamination).
